questions.q_text: How many programmers does it take to fix a lightbulb?
What pumps blood to the lower side of your abdomen?

options.b: The abdomen has its own blood

questions.q_text: How can you lift an elephant with one hand?
If it took eight men ten hours to build a wall,how long would it take four men to build it?

options.c: It depends on the technology used

questions.q_text: Some months have 31 days, others have 30 days. How many have 28 days?
